message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.CR 

The paper deals with the problem of person re-identification, which is a subfield of computer vision. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper proposes a novel deep ranking model with feature learning and fusion, which involves training a deep convolutional neural network (CNN) to learn layered feature representations. This suggests that the paper may also belong to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), multimedia (cs.MM), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper also discusses the weaknesses of conventional fixed-margin loss functions and proposes an adaptive margin loss function, which may indicate that the paper belongs to the sub-category of cryptography and security (cs.CR).
